summary: MrBeast, an American YouTube star, has the most subscribers on the platform, with over 319 million as of October 2024. YouTube introduced subscriptions in 2005, allowing users to follow their favorite channels. Since then, many channels have held the top spot, including Smosh, lonelygirl15, PewDiePie, and T-Series. MrBeast's channel grows by about 184,000 subscribers daily, making it the most popular on YouTube.
title: List of most-subscribed YouTube channels
